module.name: ergoCubEmotions
module.description: This module is responsible for controlling the ergoCub facial expressions.
module.copypolicy: Released under the terms of the BSD 3-Clause License.
module.description-long: This moudule aims to set the ergoCub facial expressions. It makes use of OpenCV libraries in order to visualize the images and the videos stored in a context called 'ergoCubEmotions' and installed in '${YARP_CONTEXTS_INSTALL_DIR}/ergoCubEmotions'.
